about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hi! My name is Bobur, and I'm a front-end developer with over 1 years of experience. I specialize in creating modern web applications using React and JavaScript.
about.description2: I love turning ideas into beautiful and functional interfaces. Always learning new technologies and striving to create quality code.
